DOC.brief_summary: The objective study see change tear osmolarity time moderate severe dry eye subject treat TheraTears® lubricate drop .
DOC.brief_title: Changes Tear Osmolarity Over Time With Sustained Use TheraTears
DOC.detailed_description: The hypothesis measure tear osmolarity study participant decrease sustain use over-the-counter artificial tear , TheraTears® lubricate drop , eight week period . Participant 's dry eye symptom would also improve sustain use TheraTears® lubricating drop .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Is least 21 year age full legal capacity volunteer ; 2 . Has read sign information consent letter ; 3 . Is willing able follow instruction maintain appointment schedule ; 4 . Is diagnosed dry eye syndrome ( least one eye ) , indicate current ocular examination , prior history ( selfreported history dry eye acceptable ) current use treatment dry eye ; 5 . Has minimum osmolarity read 316 mosm/kg baseline visit least one eye . 1 . Has take part another research study within last 30 day ; 2 . Planned contact lens wear course study ; 3 . Staff investigational site family member site staff family member currently enrol participant ; 4 . Any subject violates washout period use eye drop 72hrs washout period ; 5 . Has know ocular disease include active ocular infection , inflammation allergy , especially Salzmann 's nodular degeneration , symptomatic conjunctivochalasis , fixation disparity syndrome ; 6 . Used Restasis ( similar topical medication ) within last 6 month ; 7 . Has systemic condition opinion investigator may affect dry eye status subject , especially newly diagnose , newly prescribe and/or unstable ; 8 . Is pregnant , lactate plan pregnancy time enrolment ( verbal confirmation necessary ) ; 9 . Use medication : Systemic Antihistamine ( e.g. , Allegra® , Benadryl® , Claritin® , Dimetapp® , Unisom® , Zyrtec® , etc . ) , Isotretinoin ( e.g. , Accutane® , Roaccutane® , Amnesteem® , Claravis® , Isotroin® , Sotret® ) similar medication ; 10 . Has know sensitivity diagnostic pharmaceutical use study ; 11 . Has undergone ocular surgery ( LASIK , Cataract , etc ) within last year .
